laazotea.indi.driver

Class INDIOneElementLightProperty

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.driver.INDIProperty
      • laazotea.indi.driver.INDILightProperty
        • laazotea.indi.driver.INDIOneElementLightProperty
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class INDIOneElementLightProperty
extends INDILightProperty
    A class representing a INDI Light Property with only one Light Element (with the same name and label of the Property).
    Version:
    1.36, January 11, 2014
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • createSaveableOneElementLightProperty

        public static INDIOneElementLightProperty createSaveableOneElementLightProperty(INDIDriver driver,
                                                                java.lang.String name,
                                                                java.lang.String label,
                                                                java.lang.String group,
                                                                laazotea.indi.Constants.PropertyStates state,
                                                                laazotea.indi.Constants.LightStates lightState)
                                                                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Loads an instance of from a file or, if it cannot be loaded, constructs it with a particular driver, name, label, group, state and a initial lightState for the Element. The property will autosave its status to a file every time that it is changed.
        Parameters:
        driver - The Driver to which this property is associated
        name - The name of the Property
        label - The label of the Property
        group - The group of the Property
        state - The initial state of the Property
        lightState - Initial state for the Element
        Returns:
        The loaded text property or a new constructed one if cannot be loaded.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        See Also:
        INDILightProperty
